title: 求1.72的声音包
author: mrjic
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mrjic 于 2014-4-4 12:47 编辑 

如题，再问一句：下了声音后放哪呀？
[groupid=490]719逗比大作死！！[/groupid]

replies.author: pokemongh
replies.txt_content: 启动器里选更新声音文件

replies.author: pokemongh
replies.txt_content: .minecraft\assets ← 具体音效在这个文件里面

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content:
你是要声音的资源包
还是进游戏听不见声音?
